channel.title: Bug
channel.description:
i have constantly been shut down in whonis gateway every 1 to 2 minutes and everything is ok in workstation with the below information
664.357003} freezing user space processes ...(elapsed 0.000 seconds) done 664.358683} freezing remaining freezable tasks ...(elapsed 0.000 seconds) done 664.361121} suspending console(s) (use no_console_suspend to debug )
please help
